title: MyFeedbacks
description: A feedback management service developed to help users and companies improve some of the best products in the world.
article:
MyFeedbacks is a platform that allows you to share feedbacks, ideas and bug reports on any app or online service that you may think of. This project was built with my good friend @romainbourre, and we are still improving it on our free time.

I have been developing the entire visual interface, and I am in charge of the front-end development, done in Angular. I am working on the MyFeedbacks visual framework, to make sure all the components are harmonized across the whole platform.

I developed an adaptative dark theme based on preferences, to improve accessibility.

The color scheme must help to quickly understand the status of a post.

Our stack

  • Angular
  • .NET
  • SQLite
  • MySQL
  • Github

title: Covid-19 - Centres de test
description: As the Covid-19 pandemic started, we decided to build a platform to regroup all the testing centers when it did not exist.
